keyMoments.title: Rayleigh Reveals His Role in Roger Pirates
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh reveals that he served as the first mate and vice-captain of the Roger Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the legendary status of the crew and Rayleigh's position within it.

keyMoments.title: Crocus's Recruitment Revealed
keyMoments.description: The episode reveals that Crocus joined the Roger Pirates as their ship's doctor to help manage Roger's illness.
keyMoments.significance: Explains the crew's composition during Roger's final journey.

keyMoments.title: Shanks and Buggy Confirmed as Apprentices
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh confirms that both Shanks and Buggy served as apprentices aboard the Oro Jackson.
keyMoments.significance: Officially confirms the connection between two of the series' major characters and the Pirate King.

keyMoments.title: Crew Disbandment Revealed
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh explains that after conquering the Grand Line, Roger disbanded the crew and they silently went their separate ways.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the fate of the legendary crew and Roger's intentional plan to end his journey.

achievements.description: The Roger Pirates were the first and only crew confirmed to have conquered the entire Grand Line, earning Roger the title of Pirate King.

achievements.achievement: Discovered the Truth of the Void Century
achievements.description: The crew learned everything about the Void Century, Ancient Weapons, and the meaning of the Will of D during their journey.

formationHistory.description: After Roger contracted an incurable disease and conquered the Grand Line, he disbanded the crew one year before turning himself in to the Marines.
formationHistory.significance: Marked the end of the Pirate King's era and set the stage for the Great Pirate Era.

culturalImpact: The Roger Pirates' journey and disbandment fundamentally shaped the world of One Piece. Roger's execution speech sparked the Great Pirate Era, inspiring countless individuals to set sail in search of his treasure, One Piece.
